name: Donald Trump
emailMessage: Obamas biggest failure was not securing the disclosure of the UFO files.  It sounds like science fiction, but the potential for real-life star wars is real enough #the truth is still out there.

name: Howard Phillips Lovecraft
emailMessage: The most merciful thing in the world, I think, is the inability of the human mind to correlate all its contents. We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far. The sciences, each straining in its own direction, have hitherto harmed us little; but some day the piecing together of dissociated knowledge will open up such terrifying vistas of reality, and of our frightful position therein, that we shall either go mad from the revelation or flee from the deadly light into the peace and safety of a new dark age.

name: Alan Jones
emailMessage: Hi Tom, my code works. Why??
